name: WP Adminstrip
author: Matthew Maber & Brendan Borlase

sections.description:
Adds a strip to the bottom of the screen for logged in admin users to allow quick access to popular parts on the Administration area in WordPress.
Dashboard
Logout
Write
Manage
Options
Akismet
Mint (Disabled using comments)
Number of posts and posts page
Number of comments and comments page
Number of categories and categories page
Number of tags and tags page
somefoolwitha.com
sections.installation:
Installing should be a piece of cake and take fewer than five minutes.

Upload wp-adminstrip-2.php to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
